{"id":1236921274,"question_id":724,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 month, 1 week","timestamp":1713566016,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1236921274/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Pivot Index","memory":"45.4 MB","code":"public class Solution {\n    public int pivotIndex(int[] nums) {\n        int totalSum = 0;\n        for (int num : nums) {\n            totalSum += num;\n        }\n        \n        int leftSum = 0;\n        for (int i = 0; i < nums.length; i++) {\n            if (leftSum == totalSum - leftSum - nums[i]) {\n                return i;\n            }\n            leftSum += nums[i];\n        }\n        \n        return -1;\n    }\n\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-pivot-index","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
